scripts.build: pnpm clean && mkdir -p dist && cp -R public/* dist/ && BUILD_TARGET=options vite build && BUILD_TARGET=background vite build && BUILD_TARGET=content vite build
scripts.dev: pnpm build && (BUILD_TARGET=background vite build --watch & BUILD_TARGET=content vite build --watch & BUILD_TARGET=options vite build --watch & web-ext run -s dist -t chromium)
